item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
Weird. I really liked KoD back in college but never considered (or noticed) their influence on Interpol, but listening now I can kinda see your point. I can totally hear Interpol doing Mad as Snow.
I have no qualms with bands wearing their influences on their sleeves, so long as it isn't their only trick.
I don't hear Joy Division in TVOTR at all. Are we talking Dear Science or Desperate Youth, Blood Thirsty Babes? Maybe I need to re-listen to those. I'd say She Wants Revenge is the most guilty rip off of the Joy Division sound. By Far.
item.content:encoded:
Weird. I really liked KoD back in college but never considered (or noticed) their influence on Interpol, but listening now I can kinda see your point. I can totally hear Interpol doing Mad as Snow.

I have no qualms with bands wearing their influences on their sleeves, so long as it isn’t their only trick.

I don’t hear Joy Division in TVOTR at all. Are we talking Dear Science or Desperate Youth, Blood Thirsty Babes? Maybe I need to re-listen to those. I’d say She Wants Revenge is the most guilty rip off of the Joy Division sound. By Far.

item.title: By: Arthur Seaton
item.dc:creator: Arthur Seaton
item.description: Well, there are those who would say Interpol and the Editors, especially the latter, ripped off Kitchens of Distinction.
item.content:encoded: Well, there are those who would say Interpol and the Editors, especially the latter, ripped off Kitchens of Distinction.
